Key Match Events: Sri Lanka wins first CWC23 game, beats NED by five wickets
Pathum Nissanka walks back
Kusal Mendis departs!
Van der Merwe from around the wicket. Samarawickrama makes room and crashes it through the off side for a four. He adds one more boundary. This time with a paddle sweep.
Wicket! van der Merwe departs.
Perera brings out the sweep shot against Aryan again. This time he places it well and gets a four.
Full from Aryan and Nissanka goes for a slog sweep. Out of the reach of Engelbracht in the deep. Mendis too tries the same shot. Top-edge and it is an easy catch for Meekeren.
van Meekeren sneaks in a quiet over. Just four runs from the over.
van Beek gets to his fifty.

WICKET! van der Merwe departs. He tries to get his gloves out of the way of a freaky bouncer but it does carry a bit of feather en route to the ‘keeper. He doesn’t go for the review, which brings on Aryan Dutt in the dying moments of the innings.

Madushanka with his seventh over of the innings. Madushanka fires a yorker in. It is blocked away by Edwards. The ball trickles down to mid-on and it will be a single. Brave effort by Asalanka as he dives forward. The ball falls just short.
49.5 - Run out off a no ball! 1 extra run credited to the NED account. However, van Meekeren is the 10th wicket. Dutt charges to steal one off a bye but van Meekeren never noticed his partner.
van Meekeren successfully digs out a terrific yorker. The ball trickles down to mid-on and it will be a single. Brave effort by Asalanka as he dives forward. The ball falls just short.
van Beek hits the flattest of sixes down the ground.
Perera brings out the sweep shot against Aryan again. This time he places it well and gets a four.
Kusal Perera c de Leede b Dutt 5 (8b 1x4 0x6)
SL 56/2 in 10 overs
SL 137/3 in 25 overs
SL 196/4 in 45 overs
SL 223/4 in 48.2 overs
SL 242/4 in 49.4 overs
SL 263/5 in 48.2 overs
GAME. SET. MATCH. Hemantha steps out to thump the winner down the ground for four as Sri Lanka wins by five wickets.
